Have you just arrived in a new city and need help? Do you know the local vibe – the mentality, language, tram schedule? Are you time limited, but still want to see the most amazing sights, interesting museums, beautiful parks, or the wildest clubs? Would you also like to keep your trip cheap? We are here to help you!

TripFriend makes your visit of Prague easier and more pleasant. We will provide you with a Friend who processes an excellent knowledge of the city and who will be there to satisfy any wish or expectation connected to your visit to this wonderful city. All of course, in your native language. We make your trip easier.

You will choose, where and when will you be picked up by your TripFriend. You will choose if you want to spend your time exploring historical places, or visiting parks, local museums and the most modern shopping centres etc. You can expect TripFriend to recommend an extraordinary restaurant, good exchange, an energetic club and much more.
